mapper.select: SELECT V1.inventoryId inventoryId , V1.filmId filmId , V1.storeId storeId , V1.title title , V2.customerId customerId , V2.rentalDate rentalDate , V2.returnDate returnDate From (SELECT i.inventory_id inventoryId , i.film_id filmId , i.store_id storeId , f.title title FROM inventory i INNER JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id) V1 Inner join (SELECT inventory_id inventoryId , customer_id customerId , rental_date rentalDate , return_date returnDate FROM rental WHERE return_date IS NOT NULL) V2 ON V1.inventoryId = V2.inventoryId WHERE customerId = #{customerId};
